title: Copilot Memory Early Access for Pro and Pro+ Subscribers
description: GitHub released Copilot Memory early access on December 19, 2025, for Pro and Pro+ subscribers, featuring a new Settings UI for enabling memory functionality that allows Copilot to remember context across conversations.

community_feedback.quote: The memory feature is exactly what we needed for maintaining context in long coding sessions
Early access limited to Pro+ feels exclusionary, should be available for all paid tiers

title: GitHub Copilot Agent Skills and Enhanced Code Review Features
description: GitHub released Agent Skills support and enhanced code review features on December 18, 2025, including automatic assignee addition when assigning Copilot to issues and expanded enterprise cloud support.

community_feedback.quote: Agent Skills are going to revolutionize how we interact with Copilot for complex tasks
The automatic assignee feature saves so much time in workflow management

title: Claude Opus 4.5 General Availability and Enhanced Features
description: GitHub released Claude Opus 4.5 general availability on December 18, 2025, along with GPT-5.1 models, C++ code editing tools preview, and dynamic Copilot prompts on GitHub Docs.

community_feedback.quote: I've been seriously impressed with Opus 4.5 in recent weeks, it's incredibly good and fast at coding
COMPLAINT POST: Opus 4.5 missing model for Pro plan users, GHCP have done nothing to resolve this
Is it just me, or has Opus 4.5 got dumber this week, or am I being fed Sonnet?

title: Claude Code 2.0.74 Release with 13 CLI and 3 Prompt Changes
description: Anthropic released Claude Code 2.0.74 on December 19, 2025, featuring major CLI improvements including enhanced theme picker UI, improved search UX across resume sessions and permissions, and system prompt refinements.

community_feedback.quote: The clickable [Image #N] links that open attached images in default viewer is a game changer for workflow
Improved theme picker UI makes customization much more intuitive

title: Claude Code 2.0.73 Release with 9 CLI and 3 Prompt Changes
description: Anthropic released Claude Code 2.0.73 on December 19, 2025, featuring clickable image links that open in default viewer, improved /theme command, and enhanced search functionality.

community_feedback.quote: The diff highlight colors are terrible, almost bad enough to stop using ClaudeCode
312 votes and 53 comments on Reddit shows strong community engagement with the 2.0.71 release
For quick inline suggestions, GitHub Copilot remains faster, but Claude Code praised for deeper reasoning capabilities

title: Cursor 2.2 Release with Debug Mode, Visual Editor, and Multi-Agent Judging
description: Cursor released version 2.2 on December 10, 2025, featuring a revolutionary Debug Mode for automatic bug detection, a Visual Editor for drag-and-drop web development, Multi-Agent Judging for parallel AI recommendations, and enhanced Plan Mode.

community_feedback.quote: The Visual Editor feature seems to be generating particular excitement as it fundamentally changes how developers interact with UI elements
Cursor 2.2 Debug Mode Fixed My Bugs Automatically
Moves from static analysis to dynamic observation for debugging capabilities

title: GPT-5.2-Codex Official Launch on December 19, 2025
description: OpenAI officially launched GPT-5.2-Codex on December 19, 2025, as the most advanced agentic coding model for professional software engineering and defensive cybersecurity. The model is now the default for Codex CLI users signed in with ChatGPT.

community_feedback.quote: GPT-5.2-Codex is officially here - OpenAI drops it right after Anthropic's Claude Code updates
Thank you (again) for GPT 5.2! The performance improvements are incredible
OpenAI's most powerful programming model finally debuts for public use

title: GPT-5.2-Codex Early Release and CLI Updates 0.74.0 → 0.75.0
description: OpenAI released GPT-5.2-Codex on December 18, 2025, a new model optimized for agentic coding with extended context handling. CLI version 0.75.0 includes new splash screen, cloud execution improvements, and UI enhancements.

community_feedback.quote: Codex CLI Updates 0.74.0 → 0.75.0 + GPT-5.2-Codex (new default)
The new constraint-based loading strategy is a game changer for performance

title: Gemini CLI v0.22.0-preview.0 with Gemini 3 Pro Integration
description: Google released Gemini CLI v0.22.0-preview.0 on December 16, 2025, featuring Gemini 3 Pro and Gemini 3 Flash integration for paid users, experimental permission improvements, and enhanced tool confirmation process.

community_feedback.quote: 都快年底了，谷歌终于正式发邮件宣布向Gemini CLI用户发送更新通知
Gemini 3 Pro终端革命：5个实战场景解锁开发者生产力暴增

title: Devin Enterprise API Enhancements and Custom Slash Commands
description: Cognition Labs released Devin updates in December 2025 including Custom Slash Commands on Dec 12 and Enterprise API Enhancements on Dec 1, featuring organization-level Notes and Playbooks management and improved Sleep State Messaging.

community_feedback.quote: Custom Slash Commands that expand into predefined workflows is exactly what our team needed
The enhanced Sleep State Messaging provides much clearer status updates

title: Windsurf JetBrains Plugin Update v2.10.5
description: Codeium (Windsurf) released JetBrains plugin version 2.10.5 on December 11, 2025, with improved file search performance, fixed diagnostics downloading, and resolved workspace workflows issues.

community_feedback.quote: Codeium 已经恢复，反馈PRO被收回的，下载官方编辑器体验更好
